award_title: Competition and Cooperation in Memory-Guided Attention
subject: fMRI analysis pipelines that run elsewhere
body:
Analysis pipelines combining fMRI, eye tracking, and behavioral data rarely work outside the lab that built them. Dependency issues, preprocessing quirks, environment-specific paths.

Built Ouro to make computational methods actually reusable and citableâ€”not just described in a methods section.

Happy to show you how it works. Heading into the holidays but around if you want to chat.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
